isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - CAB - TILT: 9600 AND 9700 SLEEPER AND NON-SLEEPER CABS - WINDSHIELD WIPER MOTOR (ELECTRIC) AND COMPONENTS - INSTALL

step1.para: Place wiper linkage onto arm in the same location as when removed and retain with spring clip ( Figure 75).
Place motor assembly mounting bracket pins into body mounting plate holes ( Figure 75).

Hold and push motor assembly in position, and using wiper switch, operate motor momentarily. Motor assembly will slide to the right about 3/8 inch (9.5 mm). Turn off wiper switch. Repeat operation if not achieved the first time. Be sure mounting bracket pins are in place.
Using a suitable drift punch align right side hole. Leave drift in hole.
Install T30 Torx head screw in left side hole. Do not tighten at this time.
Remove drift and install right side screw. Tighten both screws.
Install defroster duct tube into dash panel.
Install screws securing defroster tube to dash panel. Then install grill covers.
Install all A/C, heater, and defroster flex hoses.
Install dash and fuse panel covers.
